page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES 1
page.content: An old man from the village said"I suppose they play different games now,what they used to.We used to have marbles and tops and hoops,play{Old {Crownie}and the girls had skipping ropes."Here are some games the children play today.{ {NUMBER 48}Two people hold a rope. Another person has to skip so he does not step on the rope.You say "I'm a little bumper car,number 48.I whizz around the corner,through the garden gate."You count until they step on the rope.The person goes out and the next one comes in.When you say "corner" the skipper has to run round one of the children holding the rope,to skip again without missing a skip.
